title: The United States Open Door policy in Asia did ...

content.question: The United States Open Door policy in Asia did which of the following?

choices.label: Guaranteed military support for China’s territorial integrity.
Opened China to Western trade for the first time.
Bolstered American commercial interests in China.
Rid China of European spheres of influence.

content.answer: Bolstered American commercial interests in China.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
